projects.title: Reinforcement‑Learning Local Planner
projects.description: Master’s‑thesis work implementing a reinforcement‑learning local planner for the M4 multimodal rover, delivering energy‑aware autonomous navigation over rough terrain.
projects.detailTitle: Master’s Thesis – RL Navigation for M4
projects.overview: Deployed PPO‑based joint‑state control on a 12‑DOF robot, integrating sensor fusion and adaptive gait selection that reduced cost of transport by 23 % versus baseline.

subprojects.title: Training Pipeline
subprojects.description: Built simulation‑to‑real transfer workflow with domain randomisation and curriculum learning.

subprojects.title: Navigation Stack Integration
subprojects.description: Integrated RL controller into ROS 2 Nav2 framework with behaviour‑tree mission logic.

projects.title: M4 Drone Electronics & Autonomy
projects.description: Research‑engineer role developing avionics, perception and autonomy for a heavy‑payload multimodal drone.
projects.overview: Designed a mixed‑criticality onboard network, upgraded actuation hardware for a 40 kg platform, and led SLAM research for joint state estimation.

subprojects.title: Avionics Network
subprojects.description: Architected CAN FD + Ethernet TSN bus with STM32 co‑processors and NVIDIA Jetson edge compute.

subprojects.title: SLAM & Perception
subprojects.description: Benchmarked VIO, LiDAR‑SLAM and visual‑place recognition pipelines for onboard compute.

projects.title: ANYmal Universal Tester PCB
projects.description: Development of a plug‑and‑play tester PCB automating quality‑control procedures for ANYmal sub‑assemblies.
projects.overview: Consolidated legacy testers into a modular six‑layer board with wireless pogo‑pin fixtures, shortening set‑up time by 60 %.

subprojects.title: Tester PCB Design
subprojects.description: Laid out a six‑layer board with precision ADC front‑ends, differential signal routing and galvanic isolation for safety.

subprojects.title: Wireless Interface Module
subprojects.description: Introduced spring‑loaded pogo‑pin harnesses and alignment jigs to enable contactless coupling with DUTs of varying form factors.

subprojects.title: Test‑Protocol Automation
subprojects.description: Generated YAML‑based test templates and Python scripts for repeatable, version‑controlled execution and logging.

projects.title: Rover Systems Engineering
projects.description: Defined system decomposition, interfaces and test plan for the first Xplore Mars‑analogue rover.
projects.overview: Led definition of technical requirements and manufacturing roadmap.

projects.title: Technical Management & Project Planning
projects.description: Vice President & Project Manager overseeing 50 + engineers, milestones and risk management.
projects.overview: Organised concurrent‑engineering reviews with NASA/ESA experts and secured early ERC podium finish.

projects.title: Strategic Leadership & Partnerships
projects.description: Presidency focused on external relations, funding (CHF 150 k) and long‑term strategy for an 80‑member organisation.
projects.overview: Achieved ERC 2022 1st Prize in Navigation and expanded industrial sponsorship portfolio.

projects.title: Drone Flight Controller & Avionics
projects.description: Designed and piloted the first Xplore UAV flight‑controller and sensor board for ERC 2023 drone operations.
projects.overview: Implemented sensor fusion, motor control and safety FSM; operated the drone during ERC 2023 competition.

projects.title: Hybrid‑Rocket Avionics System
projects.description: Real‑time data acquisition, telemetry and flight‑state sequencing for the Euroc‑winning hybrid rocket ‘Eiger’.
projects.overview: Delivered UHF telemetry link and FSM triggering ignition, stage separation and recovery events, contributing to Euroc 2021 victory.

subprojects.title: Telemetry Link
subprojects.description: Designed a bidirectional UHF link with CRC‑secured packets and a ground‑station GUI for live flight monitoring.

subprojects.title: Finite‑State Machine
subprojects.description: C‑based FSM triggering ignition, stage separation and recovery events from sensor thresholds.
